item.description:
WE HAVE A JAM PACKED MEETING ON

MARCH 21ST!

5:30 Networking; 6:30 MeetingCrowne Plaza, 320 Washington St., Newton, MA

  • Deal of the month with Local real estate pros Jimmy and Michael Jordan - Broad St, Weymouth, MA
    • The deal
    • How they got it
    • The rehab
    • The exit strategy
  • Bob Chartier from Home Depot will present
    • Home Depot Discount
    • Home Depot Estimator
    • Eagleview
    • Just a note - you must be a member of Boston AREIA to take advantage of this program... Become a member of Boston AREIA today!
  •  So, you know WHAT to do...but, you aren't doing it!WHY?

Watch this video - http://youtu.be/pdKe4Or5Y9cAll attendees will receive a coaching session with Kris at no charge!Kris Whitehead with Think to Succeed will close the gap at the Boston AREIA Monthly MeetingLearn:

  • The EXACT Blueprint of HOW Successful Real Estate Investors Achieve a Goal, and WHY You'll Never Be Confused Again about Achieving Yours
  • The Real Reason WHY so Few Investors Actually Achieve Their Goals...and How YOU can Position Yourself to Achieve Success
  • Why Over $60 Billion a Year is Spent on Training In the US alone that WILL NEVER Produce Success...and HOW YOU Can Easily Avoid it
  • The Common Denominator of Successful Real Estate Investors...and WHY you'll want to Start Doing This IMMEDIATELY...
  • The Shocking Truth of the "Success Triangle", a little known SECRET of the Most Successful People in the World, and HOW you can begin to implement these Strategies Immediately!
  • The #1 SECRET For Creating A Goal and Guaranteeing Your Success in Achieving it- You'll Wish You Had Learned This LONG Ago

We look forward to seeing you at this meeting!

Monthly Meeting

5:30 PM Networking, 6:30 PM Meeting, Thursday, Mar 21, 2013

Crowne Plaza, 320 Washington St., Newton, MA

Free for members; $25 for nonmembers
item.name: Boston Area Real Estate Investing Association (AREIA)
